  • 构造器详细资料

    • Truck

      public Truck​(java.lang.String make, java.lang.String model, int capacity, int wheels) throws VehicleException
      Constructor to initialize maker, model, capacity, wheels' number
      参数:
      capacity - Truck ID
      make - Truck's maker
      model - Truck's model
      wheels - Truck's wheels
      抛出:
      VehicleException - when the capacity or wheels are not valid, it will return the exception message

  • 方法详细资料

    • setCapacity

      public boolean setCapacity​(int capacity)
      Setter to set capacity (attribute value)
      参数:
      capacity - Truck's capacity
      返回:
      boolean value -- to judge if the input parameter(it's capacity) is valid

    • setWheels

      public boolean setWheels​(int wheels)
      Setter to set wheels (attribute value)
      参数:
      wheels - Truck's wheels number
      返回:
      boolean value -- to judge if the input parameter(it's capacity) is valid
